title: Terrifying CCTV Footage Shows Stray Dogs Dig Up A Baby's Grave & Run Away With Its Head
text:
In a shocking incident, stray dogs were seen carrying a severed head of a baby in Hyderabad. The incident took place near a graveyard at Banjara Hills.

According to reports, the dogs must have dug up the grave and severed the baby's head. Banjara Hills Police Inspector, N Kalinga Rao said, the CCTV footage showed the decomposed head of the baby being carried by the animals.

Picture For Representation

Speaking to TOI, Banjara Hills Inspector, N Kalinga Rao, said, "We suspect that the burial must not have done properly and the dogs must have dug up the grave. We are still looking for the rest of the body."

The cops were alerted by locals at around 9:30 pm near Banjara Hills. Cops have ruled out any case of black magic and suspect that the baby was either aborted or could have been a stillborn.

"There are several slums around the graveyard. In most cases, people who can not afford hospitals conduct deliveries at home. So, in case a baby dies, they bury them in the graveyard. We suspect that could have been the case," the report quoted the police officer as saying.

Picture For Representation

According to reports, people who cannot afford a proper burial, conduct the ceremony themselves and bury the baby in a graveyard. More often than not, the graves are not dug deep enough and stray dogs sniff out the decomposed bodies.

A case has been registered under Section 317 (exposure and abandonment of child under 12 years) in connection with the incident. The body of another baby was found near the graveyard, a week ago.

In a similar incident, a pack of stray dogs pulled a wailing child out of the drain and started barking. This alerted passersby who called the police. The whole incident was caught in a CCTV installed nearby. The CCTV footage showed the woman throwing the baby and then dogs pulling out the baby girl from the drain.
